refreshLiteratureNotesTitle: Refresh all literature note document titles

settingTab.settingTabDescription: If you have any good ideas or find bugs, please feel free to submit an issue on GitHub or email me at my email.

basic.title: Basic Settings
basic.notebookSelectorDescription: Select the notebook where the literature library is placed.
basic.referencePathInputDescription: Set the path for storing literature content in the library, starting with '/' and separating subdirectories, for example, '/Assets/References'.
basic.databaseSelectorDescription: Select the type of database to use.
basic.UseItemKeySwitchDescription:
Use the unique key of literature in Zotero as the index. When enabled, it can work without relying on the better bibtex plugin.
Only available when using the debug-bridge plugin.
basic.AutoReplaceSwitchTitle: Automatic Replacement of Zotero Links with Citation Links
basic.AutoReplaceSwitchDescription: If a block of text contains links pointing to Zotero items (including annotations copied from Zotero's PDF viewer or selected areas dragged into SiYuan), these links will be automatically replaced with citations of the respective items. This feature is intended for users who predominantly use this plugin.
basic.DeleteUserDataWithoutConfirmSwitchDescri:
When enabled, if user data would be deleted while updating literature content, the confirmation dialog will not appear.
❗❗❗Do not enable this unless you have specific requirements
basic.reloadBtnDescription: Reload the database, including checking if the literature library path exists.
basic.deleteDataBtnDescription: Delete all setting data of this plugin (only including data displayed on the setting panel).
basic.confirmRemove: Confirm to delete the setting data of ${name}?
basic.consoleDebugDescription: Enabling this will output debugging information to the console. It is recommended to keep this disabled during normal use.

citeLink.title: Citation Links
citeLink.useDefaultCiteTypeDescription: Directly use the first citation type when inserting references, without displaying a separate pop-up selection window (citation types can be manually switched via the right-click menu on citations).
citeLink.CustomCiteTextSwitchDescription:
Fully customize the format of citations. The content generated by the citation link template will no longer be anchor text, but will be directly inserted into the document.
⚠️Note: After enabling this switch, please make sure your template includes "...(( {{citeFileID}} "..."))..." or "...(( {{citeFileID}} '...'))...". Otherwise, the generated links will not be able to reference properly.
The regular expression for finding citation links is /\(\((.*?)\"(.*?)\"\)\)/g and /\(\((.*?)\'(.*?)\'\)\)/g. Please use this to handle your template format.
citeLink.linkTempInputDescription: Set the template for adding citation links to the document.
citeLink.useDynamicRefLinkSwitchTitle: Use Dynamic Anchor Text for Citation Links
citeLink.useDynamicRefLinkSwitchDescription: Enable citation links with dynamic anchor text. These links won't have a prefixed anchor text. When inserted, they will also refresh the literature note document names based on the citation link template. (Not recommended, dynamic anchor text can be less stable)
citeLink.citeNameDescription: Add the type of citation to distinguish between different templates.
citeLink.nameTempInputDescription: Set the template for updating the names of literature note documents when inserting or refreshing citations. Only effective when both 'Custom Citation' and 'Use Dynamic Anchor Text for Citation Links' are enabled.
citeLink.shortAuthorLimitDescription: Limit the maximum number of authors displayed in the shortAuthor variable (use 'et al.' for additional authors).
citeLink.multiCiteDescription: Prefix, connector, and suffix for referencing multiple literature sources at the same time.

literatureNote.title: Literature Content
literatureNote.titleTemplateInputDescription: Set the title template for generating literature content documents (user modifications will not be refreshed, titles can be regenerated using "Refresh All Literature Note Titles").
literatureNote.refreshLiteratureNoteBtnDesciption: Refresh the titles of all documents in the literature library. It will also update the document names (after switching index variables or updating versions).
literatureNote.moveImgToAssetsDescription: When importing image-type annotations, move the images to the Assets directory under the Siyuan workspace, otherwise the images cannot be displayed.
literatureNote.noteTempTexareaDescription: Set the content template for storing literature documents in the literature library.

userData.title: User Data
userData.titleUserDataInputDescription: The default is 'User Data', which can be customized
userData.userDataTemplatePathDescription: Automatically generate the user data area using Siyuan's built-in templates. Enter the template path starting with `/data/` in the input field.
userData.useWholeDocAsUserDataTitle: Use Entire Document as User Data Area
userData.useWholeDocAsUserDataDescription: Use the entire document as the user data area. Once created, it will not update. Recommended for use with the User Data Template and database features.
userData.attrViewBlockDescription: The id of the database that needed to be update during citation
userData.attrViewTemplateDescription: Add the content document of the literature to the specified database during the citation, and adjust the database properties according to this template. The following will dynamically display the corresponding relationship between the database block ID and column names:

zotero.title: Zotero Content Template
zotero.notAbleDescription: The database type used does not support inserting content into Zotero.
zotero.zoteroLinkTitleTemplateDescription: Set the title template for inserting SiYuan backlinks to Zotero corresponding items. Leave it blank if you do not want to add backlinks. The variable "{{siyuanLink}}" represents the link itself.
zotero.zoteroTagTemplateDescription: Set the template for adding tags to the corresponding item when inserting literature. Leave it blank for no default tags, use commas to insert multiple tags.

plugin.title: Plugin Settings
plugin.dbPasswordInputDescription: The password set according to the tutorial when setting up the debug-bridge plugin. The default password is "CTT" in the tutorial, and this plugin also defaults to the same password.
plugin.searchDialogSelectorDescription: Select the search panel used when inserting literature: "SiYuan" is based on SiYuan style and has faster and more stable searching speed; "Zotero" is the classic view of Zotero, which can be set in the Zotero software.

export.title: Export
export.exportWordParamDescription: Set the additional parameters for pandoc to convert markdown to Word when exporting. Separate parameters with commas, for example: '--highlight-style=haddock,--citeproc=1'. The default export parameters are: '--reference-doc=/path/to/template.docx,--lua-filter=/path/to/citation.lua'. For more parameters, refer to the Pandoc Official Documentation.
export.exportLaTeXParamDescription: Set the additional parameters for pandoc to convert markdown to LaTeX when exporting. The format is the same as Word export parameters, and the default export parameter is: '--wrap=none'.

errors.refPathInvalid: Literature Library Path Does Not Exist! Please create the corresponding path in the document tree.
errors.hotKeyUsage: Please use the shortcut key to execute this command!
errors.zoteroNotRunning: Unable to find ${type} or the debug-bridge plugin. Please check if ${type} is running and ensure the debug-bridge plugin is properly installed and up to date.
errors.zoteroRequestForbidden: Access request denied. Please update the citation plugin to the latest version.
errors.zoteroCannotReached: Failed to communicate with Zotero. Ensure the Unblock browser plugin is installed and enabled.
errors.bbtDisabled: No 'citekey' field detected. Please check if the better-bibtex plugin is running or switch to using 'itemKey' as the index.
errors.wrongDBPassword: Debug-Bridge Plugin Password Incorrect. Please set the correct password in the settings interface.
errors.userDataTemplatePathRenderError: Invalid user data template path. Failed to render the template.
errors.attrViewTemplateNotJson: The database attribute template cannot be parsed. Please verify that it is in strict JSON format.

confirms.updateWithoutUserData: The "User Data (# User Data)" area of literature note document "${title}" is not detected (missing citations or citations are invalid). Are you sure you want to update the literature content?

notices.refreshTitleSuccess: Successfully Refreshed ${size} Literature Note Document Titles
notices.changeKey: Switched Index Successfully. Literature index has been changed to ${keyType}.
notices.loadRefRepeat: Literature "${key}" is duplicated. The current document has been renamed. Please check.
notices.deleteDuplicatedDocument: Successfully Deleted Duplicated Empty Literature Content Document. Document ID: ${documentId}
